name: The World of Toto
description:
The World of Toto is a point and click adventure game where you have to help Toto escape the room. But, what's lies ahead when Toto leaves? 

How to Play:

You can right-click to switch between actions such as walk, talk, look, and interact.  
To access inventory, hover your mouse to the top.
To close the game, just right-click on the game on the taskbar (proper GUI has not been implemented yet.).
